  chunk_output_type: console

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r cars}

library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
alzheimers <- read.csv("~/riskcalc/data/alzheimers_disease_data.csv")

## BMI is fairly normal
alzheimers %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = BMI)) + geom_density(alpha = .5)
## AlcoholConsumption is fairly normal
alzheimers %>%
  ggplot(aes(AlcoholConsumption)) + geom_density(alpha = .5)
## PhyscialActivyt is fairly normal
alzheimers %>%
  ggplot(aes(PhysicalActivity)) + geom_density(alpha = .5)
## DietQuality
alzheimers %>%
  ggplot(aes(DietQuality)) + geom_density(alpha = .5)
## Sleep Quality
alzheimers %>%
  ggplot(aes(SleepQuality)) + geom_density(alpha = .5)
## Gender
alzheimers %>%
  ggplot(aes(Gender)) + geom_density
## Age
alzheimers %>%
  ggplot(aes(Age)) + geom_density(alpha = .5)
##Ethnicity is not a normal distribution
alzheimers %>%
  ggplot(aes(Ethnicity)) + geom_density(alpha = .5)
## Smoking
alzheimers %>%
  ggplot(aes(Smoking)) + geom_density(alpha = .5)


```
